product_name: TENTSILE Tree Protector Straps - Package of 3
long_description: Compatible with all Tentsile tree tents, these wide-area straps help spread load tension over a larger area of the tree, limiting longterm damage to the bark and aiding in Leave No Trace efforts.
short_description: Compatible with all Tentsile tree tents, these wide-area straps help spread load tension over a larger area of the tree, limiting longterm damage to the bark and aiding in Leave No Trace efforts.
